data.title: Liv Tyler Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Liv Tyler with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Mother named her Liv after spotting actress Liv Ullmann on the cover of TV GUIDE

Grew up believing that singer Todd Rundgren was her father

Around age 10, she discovered that family friend Steven Tyler of Aerosmith was her biological father

Made her feature-film debut in 1994's Silent Fall

Appeared in Aerosmith's 1994 music video for "Crazy" alongside Alicia Silverstone

During the filming of Empire Records (1995), co-star Coyote Shivers was actually her stepfather â€“ he was married to her mother Bebe Buell at the time

In 2003, became a spokesperson for Givenchy cosmetics; as part of that partnership, she recorded a cover version of INXS' "I Need You Tonight" in 2012

Released an etiquette book, co-written with her grandmother Dorothea Johnson, in 2013
